short_summary: Request for proposal for boiler coil
description: The acquisition of a new Boiler Coil Assembly for Clayton boiler (SF  G100M-1) which is already installed on board of the Martha L. Black  located in Quebec.
full_summary:
---------------

**RFP F3065-230001 for Boiler Coil Assembly**

**Reference Number:** WS3851704599-Doc3877828535

**Publication Date:** February 28, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** March 17, 2023, 14:00 EDT

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada – Canadian Coast Guard for the acquisition of a new Boiler Coil Assembly.

**Project Overview:**

The proposed project involves the supply of a new boiler coil assembly for the Clayton boiler (SF G100M-1) installed on board the Martha L. Black, a vessel located in Quebec, Canada.

**Contract Award:**

This RFP is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The contract will be awarded to the lowest priced bid that meets the requirements outlined in the RFP.

**Submissions:**

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted electronically by 14:00 EDT on March 17, 2023. Late bids will not be accepted.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Emilia Rochetta, Procurement Specialist at:

Email: [emilia.rochetta@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:emilia.rochetta@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**

For complete details and to download the updated RFP, please visit: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15456065?extsite=MTU0NTYwNjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15456065?extsite=MTU0NTYwNjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
